trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: Thanks to your feline heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Soft Fall
trait.text: You have resistance to falling damage, and always land on your feet.

trait.name: Feline Grace
trait.text: You have Advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks made to perform acrobatic stunts.

trait.name: Claws
trait.text: You have a set of retractable claws that are weapons with which you are proficient. They deal 1d4 slashing damage, and have the finesse and light properties.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Catfolk.
